title: Which characterize those with personality disorder

content.prompt: Which of the following best characterizes individuals diagnosed as having personality disorders?

choices.label: They are typically afraid to leave their homes.
They are consistently psychotic in their cognition and affect.
They may function reasonably well in society.
Their symptoms are characterized by sudden onset and short duration.
